evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Discussed anxiety about loan repayment and budgeting challenges. Solutions offered: 1) Contacting alumni via Professor Chen for loan guidance 2) Implementing 3-step budget system with tracking. Student responded positively: immediately drafted/sent alumni request email, created budget tracking sheet with alerts, and committed to Friday check-ins. Progress shown through concrete actions: customized outreach initiated and financial tracking system established with accountability measures.
